task.title: Computer
task.shortdesc: Square users can start taking payments on their compuers in minutes with no monthly fees.

taskbody.context:
This task allows Square users to get their money fast and access their funds in their bank account the next day.
To take payments via the Computer:

step.cmd: Log in to your Square account and go to the Virtual Terminal.
Fill in your customer 's information or choose a card on file.
Charge the customer, and your're done.
